api_list.name: Reviews by bundle ID
api_list.description: Get reviews for a chosen app by app bundle id

api_list.name: Reviews by ID
api_list.description: Get reviews for a chosen app by app id

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for apps on the App Store

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description:
Number of results to return. 
Default: 50
Max: 200

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Date param to filter apps based on release date. Will return apps released on or after this start_date

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Date param to filter apps based on release date. Will return apps released on or before this end_date

api_list.name: Privacy Permissions by ID
api_list.description: Get privacy permissions for an app by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://app-store2.p.rapidapi.com/privacy/835599320"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "app-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://app-store2.p.rapidapi.com/privacy/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "app-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Similar Apps By ID
api_list.description: Get a list of apps similar to the provided app

api_list.name: Similar Apps By bundle ID
api_list.description: Get a list of apps similar to the provided app by app bundle ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://app-store2.p.rapidapi.com/similar/bundle/com.zhiliaoapp.musically"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "app-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://app-store2.p.rapidapi.com/similar/bundle/{appid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "app-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
